name: Every Last Firefly
description:
Every Last Firefly is a 2D narrative platformer surrounded by choice. You play as a Fox, tasked with protecting your family. You must choose to appease the Serpent, gaining protection through service, or oppose the Serpent and gain safety through strength.

How to Play:
Movement ------ Left Stick
Dash ------------- Right Stick (Aim) + R2
Jump ------------- R1
Interact ---------- [X]

Credits:

Dylan Liriano --------- Narrative Design
Jose Luchsinger ------ Sound Design / Programmer
Gwen Moyer ---------- Art / Animation
Charles Palermo ----- Art / Animation
